message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.CR, cs.DS 

This paper deals with formalisms for specifying integrity constraints on databases and policies for enforcing them, which are central topics in the field of databases (cs.DB). The paper also discusses computational properties of the semantics considered, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper uses logical frameworks to establish the semantics of the formalisms, which is a topic in logic (cs.LO). The paper also discusses the concept of minimality of change, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR). Finally, the paper discusses the invariance under the shifting transformation, which is a topic in data structures (cs.DS).
